name: Life Broker
description:
MADE BY DOOR_314 TEAM 

FOR LUDUM DARE 44

(NOTICE: THE WHOLE SOUNDTRACK WAS CREATED DURING THE JAM!)

You need to watch over your Life Cost (displayed as a graph and a big digit in the left  upper corner).  

Raise it to 100 and free yourself from the Corporations' influence! Or... See it going down to 0 making your Life worthless.

You can influence your Life Cost (and other stats) by distributing your Free Time between different activities each turn. 

Each turn equals 180 days of your life, and your Free Time tells you, how much of that time you can spend on your own (RED bar is  the Corporations' influence, the BLUE one is the time you rest). Your Energy Stat influences the amount of your Free Time.

Also, each turn a Random Event takes its place! The Event's Description is in the right lower corner.

Random Events tend to have their effects, influencing your stats. Also they all have some duration (dur: X) in order not to make your life easier.

Other stats (Self-Development, Socialization) are also influencing the Life Cost.

Btw, if you happen not to win\lose at your 120th turn, you'll die because of Aging  :)

GOOD LUCK ON LIBERATING YOURSELF!

P.S.:  

Brain icon = Self-Development

Hands icon = Socialization

Human icon = Energy
